h2_title: Where to Find the Snow Fox
content: From here, you'll go through the arch behind it and take a right. Head up the stairs and you'll be at the start of the New Thunderclap Temple.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snow_Fox_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Snow Fox Questline', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Snow Fox' and the sub-subsection 'Returning to Fox Form'.
The content is as follows:
From here, you'll go through the arch behind it and take a right. Head up the stairs and you'll be at the start of the New Thunderclap Temple.
